action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid where X marks filled cells and ▢ marks empty cells. The middle row (row 3) is completely empty. The middle column (column 3) is also completely empty. All four corners contain X. There are X's in positions adjacent to the corners (except those in the middle row or column).

X ▢ ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: I see a 5x5 grid. The middle row (row 3) is all squares. The top row (row 1) and bottom row (row 5) are identical with X's in positions 1, 2, 4, 5 and a square in position 3. Rows 2 and 4 are identical with X's in positions 1, 4, 5 and squares in positions 2 and 3.

QUESTION: Do you have X marks in positions (2,2) and (4,2)?
